ciscoLocalAuthUserMIB.name: ciscoLocalAuthUserMIB

revisions.description: Deprecated clauUserTable and the following notifications: clauUserAdded, clauUserDeleted, clauUserLoggedIn and clauUserLoggedOut; Added the new objects and notifications defined in the following new mib groups: clauMIBUserInfoGroup; clauNotifControlGroup; clauMIBNotificationGroup2;

ciscoLocalAuthUserMIB.contactinfo: Cisco Systems Customer Service Postal: 170 W Tasman Drive San Jose, CA 95134 USA Tel: +1 800 553-NETSS E-mail: cs-aaa@cisco.com
ciscoLocalAuthUserMIB.description: This MIB module defines objects describing users authenticated locally by a Network Access Server (NAS). +--------+ +--------+ +---------+ | | | | | | | Client |<---->| Server |<------>| Network | | | | (NAS) | | | +--------+ +--------+ +---------+ A client is a telnet or SSH user needing access to the NAS box directly. Network user like PPP or dot1x will request NAS box for authentication to access the network. NAS box authenticates user present in the local user database. GLOSSARY Network Access Server ( NAS ) A single point of access to a remote resource and is exclusively used with Authentication, Authorization and Accounting. Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP) A data link protocol commonly used in establishing a direct connection between two networking nodes.

clauNotifEnable.name: clauNotifEnable
clauNotifEnable.description: This object specifies whether the system generates clauUserAdded1, clauUserDeleted1, clauUserLoggedIn1 and clauUserLoggedOut1 notifications.

clauUserTable.name: clauUserTable
clauUserTable.description: This table lists the currently configured local users. This table is deprecated and replaced by clauUserConfigTable.

clauUserEntry.name: clauUserEntry
clauUserEntry.description: An entry describes a local user identified by its index. An entry is created or modified when a user is defined with IOS configuration commands via CLI. An entry is removed when a user is undefined with IOS configuration commands via CLI or by automatic expiry of users when lifetime of the user is expired.

clauUserIndex.name: clauUserIndex
clauUserIndex.description: This object indicates an integer-value that uniquely identifies a local user.

clauUserName.name: clauUserName
clauUserName.description: A textual string containing the name of the locally authenticated user.

clauUserType.name: clauUserType
clauUserType.description: This object indicates the type of local user: defaultUser - Default user account type. lobbyUser - Management user with lobby admin privileges, can create and manage guest user account type. managementUser - Management user account type. networkUser - User requires accessing the network. guestUser - Type of networkUser with lifetime configured such that they can stay alive for a given time period and will expire therafter.

clauUserCreationTime.name: clauUserCreationTime
clauUserCreationTime.description: This object indicates the time the local user was created.

clauUserLifetime.name: clauUserLifetime
clauUserLifetime.description: This object indicates the expiry duration of the local user; that is, the duration the local user is valid from the creation time.

clauUserConfigTable.name: clauUserConfigTable
clauUserConfigTable.description: This table lists the currently configured local users.

clauUserConfigEntry.name: clauUserConfigEntry
clauUserConfigEntry.description: An entry describes the configured local user.

clauUserConfigName.name: clauUserConfigName
clauUserConfigName.description: A textual string containing the name of the locally authenticated user.

clauUserConfigType.name: clauUserConfigType
clauUserConfigType.description: This object indicates the type of local user: defaultUser - Default user account type. lobbyUser - Management user with lobby admin privileges, can create and manage guest user account type. managementUser - Management user account type. networkUser - User requires accessing the network. guestUser - Type of networkUser with lifetime configured such that they can stay alive for a given time period and will expire therafter.

clauUserConfigCreationTime.name: clauUserConfigCreationTime
clauUserConfigCreationTime.description: This object indicates the time the local user was created.

clauUserConfigLifetime.name: clauUserConfigLifetime
clauUserConfigLifetime.description: This object specifies the expiry duration of the local user; that is, the duration the local user is valid from thes creation time.

clauUserConfigPassword.name: clauUserConfigPassword
clauUserConfigPassword.description: This object specifies the password of the locally authenticated user. When read, this object always returns the value of a non zero-length octet string with asterick value.

clauUserConfigDescription.name: clauUserConfigDescription
clauUserConfigDescription.description: This object specifies the description of the local user.

clauUserConfigStorageType.name: clauUserConfigStorageType
clauUserConfigStorageType.description: The storage type for this conceptual row in the clauUserConfigTable.

clauUserConfigRowStatus.name: clauUserConfigRowStatus
clauUserConfigRowStatus.description: This object reflects the status of the row in this table. It can be used for creating, deleting and modifying the entries in this table.

clauUserAdded.name: clauUserAdded
clauUserAdded.description: This notification indicates when the system has added a user. This notification is deprecated and replaced by clauUserAdded1

clauUserDeleted.name: clauUserDeleted
clauUserDeleted.description: This notification indicates when the system has deleted a user. This notification is deprecated and replaced by clauUserDeleted1

clauUserLoggedIn.name: clauUserLoggedIn
clauUserLoggedIn.description: This notification indicates when the user has logged into the system. This notification is deprecated and replaced by clauUserLoggedIn1

clauUserLoggedOut.name: clauUserLoggedOut
clauUserLoggedOut.description: This notification indicates when the user has logged out of the system. This notification is deprecated and replaced by clauUserLoggedOut1

clauUserAdded1.name: clauUserAdded1
clauUserAdded1.description: This notification indicates when the system has added a user.

clauUserDeleted1.name: clauUserDeleted1
clauUserDeleted1.description: This notification indicates when the system has deleted a user or when user lifetime got expired.

clauUserLoggedIn1.name: clauUserLoggedIn1
clauUserLoggedIn1.description: This notification indicates when the user has logged into the system.

clauUserLoggedOut1.name: clauUserLoggedOut1
clauUserLoggedOut1.description: This notification indicates when the user has logged out of the system

clauMIBCompliance.name: clauMIBCompliance
clauMIBCompliance.description: This is a default module-compliance containing default object groups.

clauMIBCompliance1.name: clauMIBCompliance1
clauMIBCompliance1.description: This is a default module-compliance containing object and notification groups.

clauMIBCompliance2.name: clauMIBCompliance2
clauMIBCompliance2.description: This is a default module-compliance containing object and notification groups.

clauMIBMainObjectGroup.name: clauMIBMainObjectGroup
clauMIBMainObjectGroup.description: This is a cisco Local Authenticated User MIB Main Object group.

clauMIBNotificationGroup.name: clauMIBNotificationGroup
clauMIBNotificationGroup.description: This is a cisco Local Authenticated User MIB Notification group.

clauMIBNotificationGroup1.name: clauMIBNotificationGroup1
clauMIBNotificationGroup1.description: A collection of notifications about local user login and logout

clauNotifControlGroup.name: clauNotifControlGroup
clauNotifControlGroup.description: A collection of objects providing for configuration of notification control.

clauUserInfoGroup.name: clauUserInfoGroup
clauUserInfoGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the local user information.

clauMIBNotificationGroup2.name: clauMIBNotificationGroup2
clauMIBNotificationGroup2.description: A collection of notifications about local user addition, deletion, login and logout.
